attributes.action: Take legal action on all mps for fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: politicians have been illegaly making fraudulent claims and spending thousands of tax payers money. this has to stop and must be looked into legally by a totally independant legal body.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
